Definition: Worthy of, or causing, abhorrence, as a thing of evil omen; odious in the utmost degree; very hateful; detestable; loathsome; execrable.

Definition: An absurdity.

The act of accelerating, or the state of being accelerated; increase of motion or action; as opposed to retardation or deceleration.

Harsh and sharp, or bitter and not pleasant to the taste; acrid, pungent.

Definition: A metallic chemical element (symbol Al) with an atomic number of 13.
In an amazing manner; in a way that causes amazement; wonderfully.

Definition: In an amusing manner.

Definition: A person who is androgynous.
Example: Billy looked up at the face that went with the clogs. It was the face of a blond angel, of a fifteen-year-old boy. The boy was as beautiful as Eve. Billy was helped to his feet by the lovely boy, by the heavenly androgyne.

Definition: A substance administered to reduce the perception of pain or to induce numbness for surgery and may render the recipient unconscious.

A cone-shaped formation constructed from sediment and other available materials by ants or termites. The colony nests underneath this cone.

Definition: A grotesque representation of a figure; a gargoyle.
Having the character of apology; regretfully excusing

Definition: To fill with horror; to dismay.

Definition: To express approval (of something) by clapping the hands.

Put into practical use.
That part of a circle which a heavenly body appears to pass through as it moves above and below the horizon.

A quantity of things approaching the maximum that could be held or carried with one arm.

In an artistic manner.

Wearing nothing on the feet.

Definition: To make a short, loud, explosive noise with the vocal organs (said of animals, especially dogs).

A robe usually made of terrycloth intended to be worn when one is still damp from bathing or when there is no immediate need to dress fully.
